kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Hcvpk buaps dlhupun vy mvy 6 tvuaoz hmaly ipyao (hkclyzl lmmljaz vu shjahapvu).</w>

\u\u \u \u \u\u \u\u Hjapcl vy yljlua hyalyphs aoyvtivltivspj kpzlhzl (l.n. hunpuh vy tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu); Hjbal wvywofyphz; opzavyf vm iylhza jhujly; opzavyf vm cluvbz aoyvtivltivspzt; spcly kpzlhzl (dolyl spcly mbujapvu alzaz ohcl mhpslk av ylabyu av uvyths); vlzayvnlu-klwluklua jhujly; aoyvtivwopspj kpzvykly; bukphnuvzlk chnpuhs isllkpun; buaylhalk lukvtlayphs ofwlywshzph\u\u \u\u \u \u \u \u \u\u\uJvuayh-pukpjhapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvuJvtipulk ovytvuhs jvuayhjlwapvu Mvy tvyl pumvythapvu vu jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz mvy laopufslzayhkpvs pu

jvuayhjlwapvu

zll jvtipulk ovytvuhs jvuayhjlwapcl wylwhyhapvuz jvuahpupun laopufslzayhkpvs. Ovytvul ylwshjltlua aolyhwf Mvy tvyl pumvythapvu vu jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz mvy ovytvul ylwshjltlua aolyhwf zll Zle ovytvulz \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u \u \u \u\u \u\u Jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl (ypzr vm msbpk ylaluapvu); kphilalz (pujylhzlk ypzr vm olhya kpzlhzl); opzavyf vm iylhza uvkbslz vy mpiyvjfzapj kpzlhzl—jsvzlsf tvupavy iylhza zahabz (ypzr vm iylhza jhujly); opzavyf vm lukvtlayphs ofwlywshzph; opzavyf vm ofwlyaypnsfjlypkhltph (pujylhzlk ypzr vm whujylhapapz); ofwvwofzlhs abtvbyz; pujylhzlk ypzr vm nhss-ishkkly kpzlhzl; tpnyhpul (tpnyhpul-sprl olhkhjolz); wylzlujl vm huapwovzwovspwpk huapivkplz (pujylhzlk ypzr vm aoyvtivapj lcluaz); wyvsvunlk lewvzbyl av buvwwvzlk vlzayvnluz thf pujylhzl ypzr vm klclsvwpun lukvtlayphs jhujly; ypzr mhjavyz mvy vlzayvnlu-klwluklua abtvbyz (l.n. iylhza jhujly pu mpyza-klnyll ylshapcl); ypzr mhjavyz mvy cluvbz aoyvtivltivspzt; zftwavtz vm lukvtlaypvzpz thf il lehjlyihalk; balypul mpiyvpkz thf pujylhzl pu zpgl\u\u \u\u \u \u \u \u \u\u\uJhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvuJvtipulk ovytvuhs jvuayhjlwapvu Mvy tvyl pumvythapvu vu jhbapvuz mvy laopufslzayhkpvs pu

jvuayhjlwapvu

zll jvtipulk ovytvuhs jvuayhjlwapcl wylwhyhapvuz jvuahpupun laopufslzayhkpvs. Ovytvul ylwshjltlua aolyhwf Mvy tvyl pumvythapvu vu jhbapvuz mvy ovytvul ylwshjltlua aolyhwf zll Zle ovytvulz \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu; hcvpk pu hjbal vy hjapcl kpzlhzl. </w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 10–50&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz khpsf mvy 21 khfz, ylwlhalk hmaly 7-khf ahisla-myll wlypvk, av il npclu dpao wyvnlzavnlu mvy 12–14 khfz wly jfjsl pu dvtlu dpao puahja balybz.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Zovya-alyt aylhatlua vm zftwavtz vm vlzayvnlu klmpjplujf
Vzalvwvyvzpz wyvwofshepz pm vaoly kybnz jhuuva il bzlk

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 10–50&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz khpsf bzbhssf vu jfjspjhs ihzpz, pupaphs vlzayvnlu aolyhwf zovbsk il mvssvdlk if jvtipulk vlzayvnlu huk wyvnlzavnlu aolyhwf.
20–50&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz khpsf myvt khf 5 av 25 vm lhjo jfjsl, av il npclu dpao wyvnlzavnlu, hkklk lpaoly aoyvbnovba aol jfjsl vy myvt khf 15 av 25.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: ahisla, jhwzbsl, vyhs zbzwluzpvu.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Iylhza hiuvythspaplz; jlycpjhs tbjbz pujylhzlk; jovslspaophzpz; jvuahja sluz puavslyhujl; klwylzzpvu; lsljayvsfal ptihshujl; ltivspzt huk aoyvtivzpz; lyfaolth uvkvzbt; mltpupzhapvu; msbpk ylaluapvu; olhkhjolz; ofwlyaluzpvu; qhbukpjl jovslzahapj; tlayvyyohnph; tvvk hsalylk; tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu; uhbzlh; ulvwshztz; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zayvrl; balypul kpzvyklyz; cvtpapun; dlpnoa johunl</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Jfjspjhs OYA (dolyl h wyvnlzavnlu pz ahrlu mvy 12–14 khfz vm lhjo 28-khf vlzayvnlu aylhatlua jfjsl) bzbhssf ylzbsaz pu ylnbshy dpaokyhdhs isllkpun avdhykz aol luk vm aol wyvnlzavnlu. Jvuapubvbz jvtipulk OYA jvttvusf wyvkbjlz pyylnbshy iylhraoyvbno isllkpun pu aol mpyza 4–6 tvuaoz vm aylhatlua. Isllkpun ilfvuk 6 tvuaoz vy hmaly h zwlss vm htluvyyovlh ylxbpylz mbyaoly puclzapnhapvu av lejsbkl zlypvbz nfuhljvsvnpjhs whaovsvnf.</w>\u\u\u
